array.name: desption
array.item: Araku valley is located in Visakapatanam district in the state of Andhra pradesh
Tirumala is located in Chitoor district in the state of Andhra pradesh
Barah Shaheed Darga is located in Nellore district in the state of Andhra pradesh
Sri Kalahasti Temple is located in town of Kalahastri in state of Andhra pradesh
Dhyana Buddha Statue is located in Guntur district in the state of Andhra pradesh
Charminar is located in the city of Hyderabad in the state of Andhra pradesh
Ramoji Film City is located in the city of Hyderabad in state of Telangana
Bhadrachalam Temple is located in bhadrachalam in state of Telangana
Golconda Fort is located in Hyderabad in the state of Telangana
Medak Fort is located in Bhadrachalam district in the state of Telangana
Ooty is located in Nigiris district in the state of Tamilnadu
Kodaikanal is located in Dindigul district in state of Tamilnadu
Marina Beach is located in Chennai city in the state of Tamilnadu
Meenakshi Amman Temple is located in Madurai city in the state of Tamilnadu
Shore Temple is located in Mahibalipuarm in the state of Tamilnadu
Coorg is a rural district and it is located in state of Karnataka
Wonderla Amusement Park is has a lot of exciting things to visit,it is located in Karnataka
Chikmagalur is a hill station ,it is located in Karnataka
Nagarhole National Park is a park for famous for tigers ,it is located in Karnataka
Bangalore Palace is a royal palace in Bangalore city in state of Karanataka
Matrimandir is located in Aurovile in city of Pondicherry
Paradise Beach is famous for its views ,it is located in the city of pondicherry
Rock Beach is very clean and neat beach to visit in city of Pondicherry
Eden Beach is located in besides of paradise beach located in Pondicherry
Arulmigu Manakula Vinayagar Temple is ganesha temple which is located in Pondicheey
